step1.heading: Step 1: Provide a Secret
step1.title: Prompt
step1.description: To get it, visit the API Keys page of the OpenAI's website

step2.heading: Step 2: Select a Model
step2.title: ChatGPT Model
step2.description: This is the model that will be used to run the query.

step3.heading: Step 3 (optional): Set Context
step3.title: Context
step3.description: A set of instructions that shape every generated response.

step4.heading: Step 4: Chat Away!
step4.description1: The actual prompt for the AI.
step4.description2: The degree of randomness in AI's answer, the larger the more random.
